metadata.name: Suspicious DumpMinitool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious ways to use the "DumpMinitool.exe" binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dumpminitool.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dumpminitool.x86.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dumpminitool.arm64.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('dumpminitool\.exe', 'dumpminitool\.x86\.exe', 'dumpminitool\.arm64\.exe')) AND (NOT (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\microsoft visual studio\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\extensions\\'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt')) OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' full')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' mini')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' withheap'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--dumptype'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious ways to use the "DumpMinitool.exe" binary
